original_title: Jose Luis Perales: En Directo: 35 Años
overview: José Luis Perales celebrates his 35th anniversary in the music industry with the recording of his concerts on July 10 and 11, 2008 at the Teatro Gran Rex in Buenois Aires, Argentina, the same place where he had his first concert in Latin America in 1974.
title: Jose Luis Perales: En Directo: 35 Años
